name: Army Sniper: Attack Shoot Kill
description:
The terrorists raided a border town,The town soon occupied by terrorists.You are a lone sniper, The only surviving agent.Snipe every terrorist you come across.Use your skills learned in the army to retake the occupied streets and buildings.
Can you winning the war on terror?

Features:
-Aim and Shoot
-Counter Terror Attack
-Army Sniper
-Easy controls
Pay attention to your health point,Do not hit too many times by terrorists!
Aim at enemy, wherever he hides. This is not just a game. There is no room for remorse here, so shoot to kill the terrorists.
